official_title: A bill to amend the Panama Canal Act of 1979 to increase the investment of the United States by the amount of interest deposited in the Panama Canal Commission Fund and to transfer that amount to the miscellaneous receipts of the Treasury.

summary.text: Panama Canal Interest Act of 1987 - Amends the Panama Canal Act of 1979 to increase the U.S. investment in the Panama Canal by the amount of interest on such investment that is deposited in the Panama Canal Commission Fund as of December 31, 1985.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Panama Canal Act of 1979 to increase the investment of the United States by the amount of interest deposited in the Panama Canal Commission Fund and to transfer that amount to the miscellaneous receipts of the Treasury.
